question: I Think i have a Flu Please Help!?
question_content: Hey guys i really need you're help. i stayed Over at my brother's house Saturday night and didnt sleep the whole day We went to Outback & i orderd a medium Steak [really raw on the inside] And the next day i came home and my body started to ache & Then my head was really hot then when i went to bed i woke up and Thew up it was just like mucus tho And now i feel a little better my stomach kinda aches and my head is still hot and my body hurts.. i've been drinking 7up my mom said that helps SO what do you think, is it a Flu or food poison? and what do i do to cure it!

answers.answer_content: food poison u will have severe vomiting, stomach cramps and the runs.. majorly!  With a virus, u will have that, plus body aches, fever, nausea, light headedness and will basically feel like u have been run over by a truck!  Docs told me last week when i had the flu to drink water if u are vomiting.  if u are keeping water down, u can go to clear fluids like 7 up or ginger ale and crackers.  stay with this diet for a day before u try anything heavier.  Dont worry about eating if u have vomiting or the runs.  just drink water.  if u cant keep anything down, including tylenol or advil for your fever for 24 hours, seek medical attention, because its really easy to get dehydrated.  Once u are dehydrated, u cant get better on your own.  Good luck and feel better soon :)
Food poisoning. You should have taken the steak back and asked for it to be cooked better. Next time you'll know.
